dict.string: In comparison to the massive losses suffered by him on the stock markets, my loss because of the slight fall in dividends seems pretty picayune -- I should thank my stars I did not invest in shares
Calm and peaceful, Not easily excited
The reflection of the hills in the clear and placid water of the pond made a beautiful sight
A friendly relationship between a man and a woman, lacking sexual feelings
On being accused of having an affair with his co-star, the actor made it clear that his relationship with his co-star was platonic and nothing more than that.
An organized killing of large number of people
The pogrom of the Jewish community by the Nazis during the Second World War will go down as among the most shameful episodes of human history
The chairman of the company was a pudgy little man, very confident of himself and absolutely not conscious of his large girth
